docs.lead_paragraph: Opera Lafayette, the Washington group, lovingly resurrected and performed “Le Roi et le Fermier,” which Marie Antoinette and her courtiers performed at Versailles in 1780.
docs.abstract: Vivien Schweitzer reviews production of 1762 Pierre-Alexander Monsigny opera Le Roi et le Fermier performed by the Washington period-instrumental group Opera Lafayette at the Rose Theater.

docs.lead_paragraph: News.me, the long-awaited social news service developed in collaboration with Betaworks, a technology incubator, and The New York Times Company, is ready for its debut.
docs.abstract: News.me, an iPad-based newsfeed that uses artificial intelligence to recommend articles and links to readers, is ready for its debut.

docs.lead_paragraph: Several years ago, Darpa, the Pentagon's advanced research arm, embarked on an unusual experiment by offering a $1 million prize and inviting all comers to build autonomous vehicles capable of navigating a lengthy desert course. The result of the first race in 2004 was a disappointment, but on Saturday, 17 months after the first autonomous vehicle grand challenge, 23 finalists will set off again in search of a prize that has swollen to $2 million.
docs.snippet: The Pentagon's Darpa robot rice in Nevada has started and it looks like this year there will be a winner....

headline.main: Robotic Vehicles Contend for the Battlefield
